mapper.insert: insert into ps_product(product_num, category_num, seller_id, howtosell, hitcount, stock, product_regdate, deal_status, board_status, content, first_img, subject, product_status, price) valuse(product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category_num}, #{seller_id}, #{howtosell}, 0, #{stock}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{content}, #{first_img}, #{subject}, #{product_status}, #{price})
